user.title: SmartThings Find login (manual)
user.description:
1) Open: [smartthingsfind.samsung.com](https://smartthingsfind.samsung.com/)
2) Log in in your browser, then open DevTools (F12) → Network
3) Select the `chkLogin.do` request (refresh if needed)
4) Copy Request Headers → the full `Cookie:` line
5) Paste it below

data.jsessionid: Full Cookie header (e.g. Cookie: a=b; c=d)

error.invalid_cookie: Invalid cookie format. Paste the full Request Headers → Cookie: line.
error.auth_failed: Authentication failed. Cookie expired or invalid.
